TopicTitle: All buildings gone, I only see space.

Articles.Content:
Hi

I was just on my way to duna when suddenly my game broke. Instead of the (start) screen with the Buildings, I now see space (the background when you are in the 3d view). No Planets, I cant zoom in, but I can rotate it. Sadly, that affected all my savegames, they all are broken atm.

Help please.

Hi Kessi, please see the [**self help**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92228-Known-Issues-Self-Help) thread and the [**bug report**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-%21%21%21-PLEASE-READ-BEFORE-POSTING-%21%21%21-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide)thread, and provide your game logs ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
